WRITING.TEXT: Wheel of Time animated series in the style of a more adult Avatar: The Last Airbender.
Two Russian sleeper agents in Washington DC face an unexpected zombie apocalypse.
Yes, but also we get POV chapters from Voldemort. He's still a "bad guy," but ultimately he does the most good by defeating Harry in a bittersweet ending.

Rejection builds on itself. An introverted stone-faced thinker will have trouble connecting; those failed attempts will pile on until they see you as just another repetition of that pattern.
It's not always the case, but it happens.
Your polar opposite might feel grateful you're not just another person misreading them as a stuck-up asshole at first glance.
